overview:
Chris Sharkey is best known for having co-founded ʻStayzʼ, the largest holiday accommodation website in Australia (like HomeAway in the US) with over 14,000 listings, which he sold to Fairfax Digital in 2006 for $12.7m. Stayz continues today as the most popular self-contained holiday accommodation website in Australia.

Chris later went on to develop Driven By Limo, an Australian network of hire cars and limousines serving all states in Australia which today turns over several million dollars in revenue each year.

Chris also co-founded Sharkey Media developing many large-scale and prominent Australian startups and websites such as www.flyingsolo.com.au. Sharkey Media stopped accepting new projects in 2010 to focus on Bislr.

Chris’s experience developing businesses online and working as a developer spans over 12 years. He has a Master of Software Engineering Management (University of Technology, Sydney) and has been featured in the book, “50 Great E-Businesses and the Minds Behind Them”.

Chris is currently co-founder and CTO of Bislr.
